data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
In the minute 1, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Juarez a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, America have a goal kick.
Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Juarez in the half of America.
In the minute 7, Throw-in America.
Can Juarez capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
America pushes forward through Alonso Escoboza, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 9, Goal! Dario Lezcano gives Juarez a 1-0 lead.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
Throw-in for America at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Juarez to take a throw-in in America territory.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
In the minute 14, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Juarez throw-in in America's half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ciudad Juarez.
Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Juarez in the half of America.
In the minute 17, In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 21, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
In the minute 26, Free kick for America in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to America in their own half.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Juarez in the half of America.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Juarez's Francisco Contreras gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards America a goal kick.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Juarez throw-in in America's half.
In the minute 34, America have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
In the minute 38, Juarez are pushing forward but Dario Lezcano's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Free kick America.
In the minute 43, Juarez needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for America in the half of Juarez.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 45, Oscar Mejia Garcia will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Dario Lezcano for Juarez drives towards goal at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
The second-half is underway in Ciudad Juarez.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ciudad Juarez.
In the minute 47, Throw-in America.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Juarez have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a throw-in for Juarez, close to America's area.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for America in their own half.
Free kick America.
In Ciudad Juarez America attack through Richard Sanchez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Dario Lezcano for the home team is judged to be offside.
Juarez to take a throw-in in America territory.
In the minute 58, Can Juarez capitalize from this throw-in deep inside America's half?
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 60, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez.
Dario Lezcano of Juarez gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ciudad Juarez.
In the minute 62, America have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Antonio Lopez Amenabar is replacing Andres Ibarguen for the away team.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to America.
Jefferson Intriago (Juarez) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 69, America drives forward and Richard Sanchez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to America.
Alonso Escoboza for America gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 69, Juarez have a goal kick.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gabriel Caballero (Juarez) is making a first substitution, with Marco Fabian replacing Francisco Contreras.
In the minute 73, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Juarez a goal kick.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
America have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for America close to the penalty box.
Jesus Zavala is on a sub for Flavio Santos for Juarez.
Martin Luis Galvan is replacing Mauro Fernandez for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
America have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Richard Sanchez with Emilio Sanchez. This is the second substitution made today by Miguel Herrera.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for America in their own half.
America's Emilio Sanchez breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 83, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Juarez a goal kick.
In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 85, Free kick America.
At Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez, Martin Rabunal has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Goal! America draw level to 1-1 through a Henry Martin header.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Juarez.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ciudad Juarez.
In the minute 88, The home team replace Martin Rabunal with Brian Rubio.
Juarez make their fifth substitution with Eryc Castillo replacing Jefferson Intriago.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Juarez in the half of America.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of America.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Juarez's Eryc Castillo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick America.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Miguel Herrera is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez with Ruben Gonzalez replacing Sergio Diaz.
Juarez's Gustavo Velazquez has been booked in Ciudad Juarez.
